case 174: int i4 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int l11 = inStream.readUnsignedByte(); int k17 = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); if (aBoolean848 && !lowMem && anInt1062 < 50) { anIntArray1207[anInt1062] = i4; anIntArray1241[anInt1062] = l11; anIntArray1250[anInt1062] = k17 + Sounds.anIntArray326[i4]; anInt1062++; System.out.println("ID: " + i4 + "delay : " +k17 + "volume : " + l11); //Yes, Id, delay, and volume being received correctly } pktType = -1; return true;
